title: Spacious Pondside 3 Bed-Steps From Centre St, Longwood Med-Avail 9/1!
posting_body: Spacious and bright three bedroom on the second floor of an elegant brownstone building, steps away from both Centre Street and Jamaica Pond, available 9/1!
This beautiful unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, tons of large windows throughout, great light, a large living room and a full, formal dining room.
Additional features include a recently updated eat-in kitchen, additional basement storage, a beautifully landscaped outdoor courtyard area and on-site laundry.
This location is walking distance to several trains, the Longwood Medical Area and a short distance to downtown Boston.
Monthly rent includes heat and hot water and for further information and showings call Heidi at 617-699-4568.
